stimulusHtml: Based on the data, what is the most appropriate conclusion?
choicesHtml: Distributed practice is more effective at enhancing longer-term retention of material relative to massed practice.
Distributed practice is more effective than massed practice for short-term memory.
Massed practice is more effective than distributed practice is for enhancing sensory memory.
Massed practice is more effective for longer-term retention than distributed practice is.
